articles.author: Antonio G. Di Benedetto
articles.title: Logitech’s latest keyboard dabbles in enthusiast features - The Verge
articles.description: Hands-on with Logitech’s Alto Keys K98M mechanical keyboard, which brings enthusiast features, a pleasant typing sound, and some sharp looks to the masses.
articles.content: The Alto Keys K98M has features found in popular keyboards from smaller brands, but Logitechs price is a little higher. The Alto Keys K98M has features found in… [+5280 chars]
